milestones.title: Technical Architecture
milestones.description: Complete technical architecture design and documentation
milestones.definitionOfDone: Architecture document approved, technical specs reviewed by security team, and implementation plan finalized

milestones.title: Smart Contract Development
milestones.description: Develop and test core smart contracts for cross-chain bridge functionality
milestones.definitionOfDone: All smart contracts deployed on testnet, unit tests passing with 95% coverage, and integration tests completed

milestones.title: Security Audit
milestones.description: Third-party security audit of smart contracts and infrastructure
milestones.definitionOfDone: Security audit completed with no critical issues, all medium/high issues resolved, and audit report published

milestones.title: Testnet Launch
milestones.description: Deploy bridge on testnet and conduct comprehensive testing
milestones.definitionOfDone: Testnet deployment successful, user testing completed, and performance benchmarks met

milestones.title: Mainnet Beta
milestones.description: Launch beta version on mainnet with limited functionality
milestones.definitionOfDone: Beta launched with basic bridge functionality, monitoring systems active, and user onboarding process established

milestones.title: Full Mainnet Launch
milestones.description: Full mainnet launch with all features and full liquidity support
milestones.definitionOfDone: Full mainnet deployment, all features active, liquidity providers onboarded, and 24/7 monitoring established

projects.name: Agent Hub SDK
projects.description: SDK for building AI agents on NEAR

milestones.title: Core SDK Framework
milestones.description: Build foundational SDK framework and core libraries
milestones.definitionOfDone: SDK framework completed, core APIs implemented, and developer documentation drafted

milestones.title: Agent Templates
milestones.description: Create reusable agent templates for common use cases
milestones.definitionOfDone: 5 agent templates created, tested, and documented with example implementations

milestones.title: API Documentation
milestones.description: Complete comprehensive API documentation and developer guides
milestones.definitionOfDone: Complete API reference, developer guides, tutorials, and interactive examples published

milestones.title: Example Applications
milestones.description: Build example applications demonstrating SDK capabilities
milestones.definitionOfDone: 3 example applications built, deployed, and documented with source code available

milestones.title: Core Wallet Features
milestones.definitionOfDone: Wallet creation, transaction signing, and account management features completed

milestones.title: Security Audit
milestones.description: Comprehensive security audit and vulnerability assessment
milestones.definitionOfDone: Security audit completed, all critical vulnerabilities addressed, and security report published
